text: Ana nehuno Hesekai'a Jerusalemi rankuma keginamo'ma havizama hu'neama'a eri so'e nehuno, kuma'ma kegavama hu zaza nona ana agofetu negino, ana have keginamofo amefira mago have kegina nehuno, Deviti kumapima mopamo'ma uraminerega tukeheno mopa kateno ante aviteno evu'ne. Ana nehuno ha'ma hu'zantamine, hankoraminena rama'a tro hu'ne.
